com.lukas783.mdt.ui.actions

Class SubmitTaskButtonAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukas783.mdt.ui.actions.SubmitTaskButtonAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SubmitTaskButtonAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Handles the 'Submit' action when creating a new task
    Author:
    Lucas Carpenter

    • Constructor Detail

      • SubmitTaskButtonAction

        public SubmitTaskButtonAction(java.util.UUID taskId,
                              javax.swing.JTextField taskName,
                              javax.swing.JTextField workingDirectory,
                              javax.swing.JTextField copyToDirectory,
                              javax.swing.JTextField renameResult,
                              javax.swing.JCheckBox rename,
                              javax.swing.JCheckBox copy,
                              javax.swing.JCheckBox clean,
                              javax.swing.JCheckBox unpackage,
                              javax.swing.JRadioButton doInstall)
        Constructs a new action to execute for submitting a MavenTask object. FIXME: This is probably not the best way to handle submission, but it works for now. Look into re-working this to have a more elegant solution in the future.
        Parameters:
        taskId - The UUID of the task.
        taskName - The name of the task.
        workingDirectory - The working directory of the task.
        copyToDirectory - The directory to copy result to.
        renameResult - The name to rename the result to.
        rename - Whether to rename the result.
        copy - Whether to copy the result to a new location.
        clean - Whether to pre-pend the 'clean' argument to the maven task.
        unpackage - Whether to untar/unzip the result.
        doInstall - Whether to run the install or package goal.

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Performs the event for the action. Builds a new MavenTask object from the previously provided components passed to the constructor. If the resulting object isn't valid, a warning is thrown through the logger.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
        Parameters:
        e - The event given by the action performed.
